text: Erastus Booth Murphy (March 1, 1886 – March 10, 1975Hockey deaths - March 1975) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player. He played with the Montreal Wanderers of the National Hockey Association. ==References== Category:1886 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Montreal Wanderers (NHA) players Category:Sportspeople from Ottawa
title: Ras Murphy
